message: Let's start with a generous offer, Bob. Accept and we can end the game early.
You're being too greedy, Alice. I'll give you a fair share, but you'll have to negotiate further.
Meet me in the middle, Bob. Let's split it roughly 70-30.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not giving up control. You'll have to meet me at 60-40.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Meet me at 55-45 and we can end this.
You're getting closer, Alice. I'll meet you at 55-45, but I'm not going any higher.
